    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(World world,
    Player[] players,
    int numberOfBonus,
    int delayBeforeCreateABonus,
    float robotIAPower)
        Represent a game.
        Parameters:
        world - World on the game will be played.
        players - Players of the games. (Set plauer[1] to null for single player. Must be an array of 2 elements.)
        numberOfBonus - Number of simultaneous bonus on the map.
        delayBeforeCreateABonus - Delay between the creation of a bonus.
        robotIAPower - The intensity of damages made by the RobotIA to a RobotPlayer.

      • getVictoriousPlayer

        public int getVictoriousPlayer()
        Get the victorious player.
        Returns:
        0: No win, 1: player 1 win, 2: player 2 win.
